moves.1... d5 2. Nc3: Bad move on my part. Allows his pawn to penetrate with d4.
moves.2... d4 3. Nce2 e5 4. c3: I need to remove the pawn.
moves.4... Nc6 5. cxd4 Nxd4 6. Qa4+ c6 7. Nf3: He must have thought that I was going for the Knight! Nah, I'll take free pawns!
moves.13... Rad8 14. Qf3 Bxb3: ! I didn't see This move. I can't take because I would lose a pawn.
moves.20. axb3 Re8 21. h3 Rxd2 22. Rae1: I probably should have taken his a pawn. But then again, it would have weakened my back rank.
moves.22... Re2 23. Red1 h6 24. Qc3 Qe5 25. Qc: Yes, I did see this coming.
moves.33... Qe4 34. fxg6+: "Please take with pawn!" I prayed. I could win the Queen with a Rook check/sack.
moves.37. Rf2 a5 38. Qd6 Qe5: Can you find the game winning move?
moves.39. Rxf7+: !! Did you find it? If he takes the Rook, he loses his Queen. If he doesn't take, Qg6+ or Qxh6+ both lead to mate.
moves.39... Kg8 40. Qg6+: Here, my opponent left the game (we were in blitz), but the game would have been over anyway. Thank you for watching! Please R&C!
